item.title: Science in the Supermarket
item.description: Photograph of engagement stand inside a supermarket in the West Country. Science in the Supermarket was an engagement project, funded by Imperial College London’s Societal Engagement Seed Fund to promote studying STEM subjects to young families in the West Country. Visit the project website Target audience The campaign targeted families with low science capital to promote the acceptance rates of students from these backgrounds into higher-education programmes. item.title: Down to Earth
item.description: I was commissioned by The Naked Scientists to produce a mini-series of episodes exploring different space-technology spin-offs, called Down to Earth. Each episode explores how a technology that was originally developed for space exploration became useful in life on the planet. Episodes were broadcast in the UK on BBC Radio and internationally as part of the main radio show.
